text:
Mixpo (https://www.mixpo.com/) | Seattle, WA | ONSITE

Mixpo is a social, display and video advertising platform. Our platforms helps advertisers, agencies and media companies build, deliver and measure ad campaigns. If you’re a senior dev looking for a lot of ownership and ability to shape our 90-person company’s future, send me a note!

Lead Back End Engineer: http://mixpo.co/1OMzPlV

Senior Software Developer - Big Data: http://mixpo.co/1nh6mKP

Senior Front End Developer - http://mixpo.co/1XYpv1p

Please reach out to me directly - mwinderbaum@mixpo.com
